description: This file provides utility functions to generate standardized response payloads for success and error scenarios in a web application.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] success(data: Optional[Any] = None, message: str = "ok", **kwargs)
methods.description: Generates a standardized success response payload with optional data, message, and additional fields.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] error(message: str, code: Optional[str] = None, details: Optional[Any] = None, **kwargs)
methods.description: Generates a standardized error response payload with message, optional code, details, and additional fields.

ctags.name: error
ctags.pattern: /^def error(message: str, code: Optional[str] = None, details: Optional[Any] = None, **kwargs) -> /
ctags.signature: (message: str, code: Optional[str] = None, details: Optional[Any] = None, **kwargs)

ctags.name: success
ctags.pattern: /^def success(data: Optional[Any] = None, message: str = "ok", **kwargs) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
